mapper.select: select org.ORG_NAME org_name,a.table_schema,a.table_name ,a.table_comment,org.CD_HB_SOURCE from information_schema.tables a left join test.t_org_code org on a.TABLE_SCHEMA = org.database_name where a.table_schema like 'ds\_%' and a.TABLE_NAME != 'zlxt_error_msg' and a.TABLE_NAME not like '%\_copy'

select org.ORG_NAME org_name,a.table_schema,a.table_name ,a.table_comment,org.CD_HB_SOURCE from information_schema.tables a left join test.t_org_code org on a.TABLE_SCHEMA = org.database_name where a.table_schema like 'jg\_%' and a.TABLE_NAME != 'zlxt_error_msg' and a.TABLE_NAME not like '%\_copy' and a.TABLE_SCHEMA != 'jg_fgw_xyhb' and a.TABLE_NAME not like '%\_20%' and a.TABLE_NAME not like '%\_old' and a.TABLE_SCHEMA != 'jg_xfk' and a.table_comment != 'VIEW' and a.table_name not in('item_change','jg_ry','jg_jzgd','shijian_tyshxydm') ORDER BY org.`ID`

select a.table_schema,a.table_name ,a.table_comment from information_schema.tables a where a.table_schema = 'hbjg_jc_all' and a.TABLE_NAME != 'dn_data_reconciliation' and a.TABLE_NAME != 'up_data_reconciliation' and a.TABLE_NAME != 't_org_code' and a.TABLE_NAME != 'table_jgsx'
SELECT COUNT(*) zlCount,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM `hbjg_hj_all`.${table_name} GROUP BY CD_HB_SOURCE
SELECT COUNT(*) zqCount,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM `hbjg_jc_all`.${table_name} GROUP BY CD_HB_SOURCE
SELECT COUNT(*) qzCount FROM ${table_schema}.${table_name}
SELECT COUNT(*) qzCount FROM ${table_name} where CD_HB_SOURCE = #{CD_HB_SOURCE}
SELECT * FROM test.t_org_code order by id

select org.ORG_NAME,t.TABLE_SCHEMA,t.TABLE_NAME,c.COLUMN_NAME from ( select b.TABLE_SCHEMA,b.TABLE_NAME, count(1) num from information_schema.columns b where (b.TABLE_SCHEMA like 'ds\_%' or b.TABLE_SCHEMA like 'jg\_%') and b.column_name in ('CD_ID', 'CD_TIME', 'CD_SOURCE', 'CD_OPERATION', 'DATA_UP_TIME', 'DATA_UP_STATUS', 'DATA_UP_UUID') group by b.TABLE_SCHEMA,b.TABLE_NAME) t left join information_schema.columns c on t.TABLE_SCHEMA = c.TABLE_SCHEMA and t.TABLE_NAME = c.TABLE_NAME left join test.t_org_code org on t.TABLE_SCHEMA = org.database_name where t.num < 7 and t.TABLE_NAME != 'zlxt_error_msg' and c.COLUMN_NAME in('CD_ID', 'CD_TIME', 'CD_SOURCE', 'CD_OPERATION', 'DATA_UP_TIME', 'DATA_UP_STATUS', 'DATA_UP_UUID') and t.TABLE_NAME not like '%\_copy' and t.TABLE_SCHEMA != 'jg_fgw_xyhb' and t.TABLE_SCHEMA != 'jg_xfk' order by c.TABLE_SCHEMA,c.TABLE_NAME

select org.org_name,tt.*, case when qz_field_long > bz_field_long and qz_field_type != bz_field_type then '字段长度设置过长、字段类型不符合要求' when qz_field_long > bz_field_long then '字段长度设置过长' when qz_field_type != bz_field_type then '字段类型不符合要求' end czwt from ( select aa.km,aa.bm,aa.zs,aa.zdmc,aa.zdcd as qz_field_long,bb.zdcd bz_field_long,aa.zdlx qz_field_type,bb.zdlx bz_field_type from ( select a.table_schema as km,a.table_name as bm,'' zs,a.column_name zdmc,a.data_type zdlx,a.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH zdcd from information_schema.columns a where (a.table_schema like 'jg\_%' or a.table_schema like 'ds\_%') ) aa left join ( select b.table_schema as km,b.table_name as bm,'' zs,b.column_name zdmc,b.data_type zdlx,b.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH zdcd from information_schema.columns b where b.table_schema = 'jggbtest') bb on lower(aa.bm) = lower(bb.bm) and lower(aa.zdmc) = lower(bb.zdmc) where bb.bm is not null and ((aa.zdlx != bb.zdlx and aa.zdcd > bb.zdcd) or aa.zdcd > bb.zdcd) order by aa.km,bb.bm ) tt left join test.t_org_code org on tt.km = org.database_name

select sum(t.num) num from
select count(1) num from ${item.databaseName}.${item.tableName}

select sum(t.zlCount) zlCount from
SELECT COUNT(*) zlCount FROM `hbjg_hj_all`.${item.tableName} where CD_HB_SOURCE = #{item.cdHbSource}

select sum(t.zqCount) zqCount from
SELECT COUNT(*) zqCount FROM `hbjg_jc_all`.${item.tableName} where CD_HB_SOURCE = #{item.cdHbSource}

select a.table_schema,a.table_name ,a.table_comment from information_schema.tables a where a.table_schema = #{value} and a.table_name in ('jg_jgxw_check_action','jg_jgxw_punish_action','jg_jgxw_force_action','jg_jgxw_other_action')

select aa.ORG_NAME, tt.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, tt.MATTER_NAME, tt.DEPARTMENT_NAME, tt.num from ( select a.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, b.DEPARTMENT_NAME, b.MATTER_NAME, a.num, b.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.CD_HB_SOURCE from ( select count(1) num, SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, left(SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE, 8) code, CD_HB_SOURCE from jg_jgxw_check_action group by code, CD_HB_SOURCE) a left join jg_jgsx_publish_directory b on a.code = b.MATTER_CODE where b.MATTER_NAME is not null union all select a.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, b.DEPARTMENT_NAME, b.MATTER_NAME, a.num, b.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.CD_HB_SOURCE from (select count(1) num, SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, left(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, 8) code, CD_HB_SOURCE from jg_jgxw_force_action group by code, CD_HB_SOURCE) a left join jg_jgsx_publish_directory b on a.code = b.MATTER_CODE where b.MATTER_NAME is not null union all select a.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, b.DEPARTMENT_NAME, b.MATTER_NAME, a.num, b.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.CD_HB_SOURCE from (select count(1) num, SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, left(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, 8) code, CD_HB_SOURCE from jg_jgxw_other_action group by code, CD_HB_SOURCE) a left join jg_jgsx_publish_directory b on a.code = b.MATTER_CODE where b.MATTER_NAME is not null union all select a.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, b.DEPARTMENT_NAME, b.MATTER_NAME, a.num, b.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.CD_HB_SOURCE from (select count(1) num, SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, left(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, 8) code, CD_HB_SOURCE from jg_jgxw_punish_action group by code, CD_HB_SOURCE) a left join jg_jgsx_publish_directory b on a.code = b.MATTER_CODE where b.MATTER_NAME is not null) tt left join t_org_code aa on tt.CD_HB_SOURCE = aa.CD_HB_SOURCE

select * from ( select a.name, a.bm, a.sx, a.org_name orgname from table_jgsx a left join ( select tt.*, aa.ORG_NAME from ( select a.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, b.DEPARTMENT_NAME, b.MATTER_NAME, a.num, b.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.CD_HB_SOURCE, a.code from ( select count(1) num, SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, left(SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE, 8) code, CD_HB_SOURCE from jg_jgxw_check_action group by code, CD_HB_SOURCE) a left join jg_jgsx_publish_directory b on a.code = b.MATTER_CODE where b.MATTER_NAME is not null union all select a.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, b.DEPARTMENT_NAME, b.MATTER_NAME, a.num, b.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.CD_HB_SOURCE, a.code from (select count(1) num, SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, left(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, 8) code, CD_HB_SOURCE from jg_jgxw_force_action group by code, CD_HB_SOURCE) a left join jg_jgsx_publish_directory b on a.code = b.MATTER_CODE where b.MATTER_NAME is not null union all select a.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, b.DEPARTMENT_NAME, b.MATTER_NAME, a.num, b.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.CD_HB_SOURCE, a.code from (select count(1) num, SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, left(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, 8) code, CD_HB_SOURCE from jg_jgxw_other_action group by code, CD_HB_SOURCE) a left join jg_jgsx_publish_directory b on a.code = b.MATTER_CODE where b.MATTER_NAME is not null union all select a.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, b.DEPARTMENT_NAME, b.MATTER_NAME, a.num, b.DEPARTMENT_ID, a.CD_HB_SOURCE, a.code from (select count(1) num, SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, left(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, 8) code, CD_HB_SOURCE from jg_jgxw_punish_action group by code, CD_HB_SOURCE) a left join jg_jgsx_publish_directory b on a.code = b.MATTER_CODE where b.MATTER_NAME is not null) tt left join t_org_code aa on tt.CD_HB_SOURCE = aa.CD_HB_SOURCE ) t on a.name = t.ORG_NAME and a.sx = t.MATTER_NAME where t.ORG_NAME is null) mm order by mm.name

select t.* from
select a.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,b.DEPARTMENT_NAME,b.MATTER_NAME,a.num from (select count(1) num, SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE, left( SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) code from ${item.table_schema}.${item.table_name} group by SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE ) a left join jg_xfk.jg_jgsx_publish_directory b on a.code = b.MATTER_CODE where b.MATTER_NAME is not null
t order by t.num desc

SELECT department_id,E.province,sx AS sx_fz,E.fgl_fm,CASE WHEN sx>0 THEN sx/E.fgl_fm ELSE 0 END AS jgsx_fgl,IFNULL(F.sbsj,0) AS jgsx_jsl FROM (SELECT A.department_id,A.fgl_fm,A.province,COUNT(B.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE) sx FROM (SELECT province,department_id,CD_HU_SOURCE,fgl_fm FROM test.`depart` WHERE city ='省直')A LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE ,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM (SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM `jg_jgxw_check_action` UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM `jg_jgxw_force_action` UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM `jg_jgxw_punish_action` UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM `jg_jgxw_other_action`)C GROUP BY CD_HB_SOURCE,SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE)B ON A.CD_HU_SOURCE=B.CD_HB_SOURCE AND B.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE !='无' AND B.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.province,A.department_id )E LEFT JOIN
(SELECT B.province,COUNT(*)/SUM(sbsj) sbsj FROM (SELECT SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE,sbsj FROM (SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,CHECK_DATE,CD_HB_time) sbsj FROM `jg_jgxw_check_action` WHERE CHECK_DATE>'2019-10-01 00:00:00' AND SYSDATE()>CHECK_DATE UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,SUBMITTED_DATE,CD_HB_time) sbsj FROM `jg_jgxw_force_action` WHERE SUBMITTED_DATE>'2019-10-01 00:00:00' AND SYSDATE()>SUBMITTED_DATE UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,set_date,CD_HB_time) sbsj FROM `jg_jgxw_punish_action` WHERE set_date>'2019-10-01 00:00:00' AND SYSDATE()>set_date UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,SUBMITTED_DATE,CD_HB_time) sbsj FROM `jg_jgxw_other_action` WHERE SUBMITTED_DATE>'2019-10-01 00:00:00' AND SYSDATE()>SUBMITTED_DATE )C )A, (SELECT province,CD_HU_SOURCE FROM test.`depart` WHERE city ='省直')B WHERE A.CD_HB_SOURCE=B.CD_HU_SOURCE AND A.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE !='无' AND A.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY B.province)F ON E.province =F.province ORDER BY department_id

SELECT department_id,E.province,sx AS sx_fz,E.fgl_fm,CASE WHEN sx>0 THEN sx/E.fgl_fm ELSE 0 END AS jgsx_fgl,IFNULL(F.sbsj,0) AS jgsx_jsl FROM (SELECT A.department_id,A.fgl_fm,A.province,COUNT(B.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE) sx FROM (SELECT province,department_id,CD_HU_SOURCE,fgl_fm FROM test.`depart` WHERE city ='省直')A LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE ,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM (SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM `jg_jgxw_check_action` UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM `jg_jgxw_force_action` UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM `jg_jgxw_punish_action` UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE FROM `jg_jgxw_other_action`)C GROUP BY CD_HB_SOURCE,SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE)B ON A.CD_HU_SOURCE=B.CD_HB_SOURCE AND B.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE !='无' AND B.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.province,A.department_id )E LEFT JOIN
(SELECT B.province,COUNT(*)/SUM(sbsj) sbsj FROM (SELECT SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE,sbsj FROM (SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_IMPLEMENT_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,CHECK_DATE,CD_HB_time) sbsj FROM `jg_jgxw_check_action` WHERE CHECK_DATE>'2019-10-01 00:00:00' AND SYSDATE()>CHECK_DATE UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,SUBMITTED_DATE,CD_HB_time) sbsj FROM `jg_jgxw_force_action` WHERE SUBMITTED_DATE>'2019-10-01 00:00:00' AND SYSDATE()>SUBMITTED_DATE UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,set_date,CD_HB_time) sbsj FROM `jg_jgxw_punish_action` WHERE set_date>'2019-10-01 00:00:00' AND SYSDATE()>set_date UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,8) SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE,CD_HB_SOURCE,TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,SUBMITTED_DATE,CD_HB_time) sbsj FROM `jg_jgxw_other_action` WHERE SUBMITTED_DATE>'2019-10-01 00:00:00' AND SYSDATE()>SUBMITTED_DATE )C )A, (SELECT province,CD_HU_SOURCE FROM test.`depart` WHERE city ='省直')B WHERE A.CD_HB_SOURCE=B.CD_HU_SOURCE AND A.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE !='无' AND A.SUPERVISE_ITEM_CODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY B.province)F ON E.province =F.province ORDER BY department_id

SELECT COUNT(c.cd_lsh) num,table_name,c.error_column,c.msg,D.CD_HB_source FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.*,b.table_name FROM (SELECT cd_lsh,error_column,msg FROM `hbjg_jc_false`.${fdTableName})A, (SELECT cd_lsh,table_name FROM `hbjg_jc_false`.${fiTableName})B WHERE A.cd_lsh = B.cd_lsh)C, (SELECT * FROM `hbjg_hj_all`.${hjTableName})D WHERE C.cd_lsh =D.cd_lsh GROUP BY table_name,c.error_column,c.msg,D.CD_HB_source ORDER BY CD_HB_source,msg
select table_name from information_schema.`TABLES` where table_schema='hbjg_jc_false' and table_type='BASE TABLE' and table_name REGEXP '_fd|_fi'

select a.table_schema,a.table_name ,a.table_comment from information_schema.tables a where a.table_schema = 'hbjg_hj_basic_all' and a.TABLE_NAME != 'dn_data_reconciliation' and a.TABLE_NAME != 'up_data_reconciliation' and a.TABLE_NAME != 't_org_code' and a.TABLE_NAME != 'depart' and a.TABLE_NAME != 'table_jgsx' and a.TABLE_NAME not REGEXP '[0,9]+|_cp|_copy'
